faqs.q: How many calories in one tsp of olive oil?
What is the fat content in 1 tsp olive oil?
faqs.a: 4.5 g total fat, including 0.6 g saturated; mostly healthy monounsaturated fats.

faqs.q: Does extra virgin olive oil have more calories than regular?
faqs.a: No, both have about 40 kcal per tsp; extra virgin offers more antioxidants.

faqs.q: How many teaspoons in a tablespoon of olive oil?
faqs.a: 3 tsp per tbsp, equaling around 120 kcal.

faqs.q: Does heating olive oil change its calorie count?
faqs.a: Calories stay the same at 40 kcal per tsp, but high heat may alter some nutrients.
